channel.title: +2 for global moderators
channel.description:
Let us welcome back Tom to the MoparScape global moderator team. Also, let's welcome our newest global moderator, the elve age. We've been happy with his activity and his eagerness to push ideas forward. We're sure he's a great addition to the team.
-Administration

item.title: +2 for global moderators
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I hate you
You hate me
Lets go crash a spam party
With a great big lock and a warn from me to you
Wont you say you hate me to

Read full topic

item.title: +2 for global moderators
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:32, topic:466431”]Welcome back Tom, and congratulations Elve Age!

Why do people hate the elve age? I guess some people hate all mods, not naming names cough david cough.

I think it’s a little unfair that people dislike him. It’s not in our job description to get people to like us, although it’s obviously a bonus. Unfortunately you can’t make everybody happy. :([/quote]
it’s not every mod specifically.
TEA is not liked amongst a good majority of members for an odd reason.

Also, if a mod is somewhat hated. Thats not technically a bad thing, it just means they are doing their job.

Read full topic

item.title: +2 for global moderators
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:33, topic:466431”]tom.

1 more mod to abuse powers on me specifically.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: +2 for global moderators
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Thanks guys, and congratulations TEA I’m sure he’ll go a great job

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:33, topic:466431”]tom.

1 more mod to abuse powers on me specifically.[/quote]

For anyone with this issue: As always, and with anyone regardless of situation I always encourage members to come and speak to me specifically if they have a problem with my actions, or anything relating to my judgment. I’m not hard to find, either PM me or find me on the IRC.

I’m sure we agree if a staff member is misusing their power then they should be held to account, but what I don’t agree with is the misplacement of words by members who do nothing but bark all day about how they’re a victim of the system. I’m aware some of my decisions regarding your position on the MoparCraft server might not have been popular, but unfortunately that’s what I believe. It isn’t abuse, it’s a judgment which disagrees with your own and there is quite a clear difference. I don’t want to get into the thiner detail here, so please do bring this up with me if you want to talk about it.

tyb97:

Eh. Moderation here is starting to get more and more corrupted. I’ve asked a mod once or twice before asking why I got a certain offense, and they never reply. Then get yelled at later on for me not providing a “positive environment” around here. There’s also a large amount of mod disagreement and trolling, which isn’t good for mods to be doing. Just my thoughts.

I think you’re assuming the worst by saying the moderation is corrupted, I know a lot of the moderators on a personal level and I can assure you they’re very nice people when you speak to them. It’s that time of year again where people are generally busy, they’re people too.

I’ve looked through your infractions and they all seem pretty reasonable. I haven’t personally seen any staff trolling so I can’t really say anything, but in terms of staff disagreements I would disagree. The staff have disagreements all the time, it’s not a bad thing it’s just how the world works with people holding different opinions on different subjects. As long as we’re not ripping each others limbs off I don’t see the problem? If there is a problem, and you can’t contact a staff member simply ask another moderator to bring it up. I have no issues doing that if you either PM me or find me on the IRC.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:466431”]welcome back tom I hope your tests went well (if I remember right that’s the reason you left? )

gratz elve I knew you would make it[/quote]

Thank you, and yeah I had some stuff to crack on with I also fancied a bit of a break

tl;dr if you have a problem with anything or feel you cant contact a staff member just find me and talk away. If you’re gonna just scream abuse with constructively talking please expect to be completely ignored.

Read full topic

item.title: +2 for global moderators
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I PM’d mods before and they won’t even answer. Last time I tried to PM him a reply, his inbox was full. Last time I PM’d David that stuck-up son-of-a-gun didn’t even reply. Only person who ever replies really is Lin in IRC. Which he really can’t do anything about anything lol.

Read full topic

Just my thoughts.
[/quote]
